caption: A person in an office is on the phone while they observe images on the computer screen. The images are related to galaxies and the cosmos. Many radio telescopes and spacecraft appear. A woman walks on a hill near an observatory. Inside, a group of people continues to observe images. The celestial scene near the observatory undergoes transformations. People use their hands and pens to point at the screen. They also create various images and charts. A woman occasionally appears and speaks into the camera. In a snowy landscape, many people are moving around, and there is an airplane. A person is working with equipment. One galaxy emits two intense beams of light. The night sky near a laboratory continues to change. Two galaxies approach each other and experience a major collision, interspersed with interviews with several individuals explaining what's happening.
